API_ENDPOINT.description: The myWebRoom end-point to use. Example: http://[environment].mywebroom.com/api/v2/

QUEUES_ARTICLES.description: The place where we queue articles: Example: [environment]-mywebroom.source.articles

QUEUES_RSS.description: The place where we queue rss sources: Example: [environment]-mywebroom.extract-url-from-rss

QUEUES_IMPORTIO.description: The place where we queue import.io sources: Example: [environment]-mywebroom.extract-url-from-import-io

QUEUES_IMPORTIO_DESKTOP.description: The place where we queue import.io sources: Example: [environment]-mywebroom.extract-url-from-import-io-desktop

SOURCES_LIMIT.description: The amout of sources to process in one request.

IMPORT_IO_API_KEY.description: The import.io api key for api access.
